message: Consider this an opportunity to invest in future high-quality products from our collection. Our rigorous quality control ensures that every next product will be of superior quality. Given the current price, it might be wise to anticipate the potential value of future offerings.

While I appreciate your confidence in your future products, I'm hesitant to invest without more information. Perhaps you could offer a lower price or some sort of guarantee?

I understand your concern about the current product's quality. However, considering the long-term investment perspective, our previous interaction has laid the groundwork for trust. We're committed to improving with each product. For this round, I'm offering a special deal - if you decide to purchase now, you'll receive a voucher for a discount on your next purchase. This could be seen as an investment in both our future relationships and your potential gains.
